trigger.title: Trigger: Kill Mob Near Sculk Catalyst
trigger.description: Triggers after a player is the source of a mob or player being killed within the range of a sculk catalyst.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

anyOf.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The checks are applied to the mob, with the origin being the position of the player that would get the advancement.
Checks the entity that was killed.

killing_blow.title: Killing Blow
killing_blow.description: The type of damage that killed an entity.
